description:
Several members requested that I get a girl in a nice business suit and take her to a dirty biker bar for some real public humiliation. It just so happens that we have a biker bar across the street from the armory, so when I got Harmony Rose in town for Public Disgrace I dressed her up all business like, put a sign that read free fuck around her neck, and walked her ass right on over to The Ace Cafe. Believe me, there's nothing quite like watching Harmony get fucked, used, and abused by a bar full of horny drunk bikers. You want to see this.
Check out the Behind Kink piece about Harmony's shoot here.
title: The business suit and the biker bar
